document_data.name: Glinda Scatterstar
document_data.occupation: Mage's Guild head, secretly resistance fighter
document_data.mainbody: '''Glinda Scatterstar''' was the master of the [[Mage's Guild]] of [[Hillsfar]] and secretly an active rebel against Lord [[Maalthiir]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Glinda saw Maalthiir as a ruining influence in her city and she changed the objective of the Guild to actively remove him from power.
document_data.Activities: In order to advance her plan, although very slowly, Glinda tried to expand the Mage's Guild as much as possible, by not only training new [[wizard]]s but also molding the minds of their pupils against Maalthiir. She also secretly smuggled into the city a number of [[elves]] and [[half-elves]] to reinforce her guild. Glinda waited for the inevitable defeat of the [[Red Plumes]] by the [[Zhentarim]] before she would act.
document_data.History: Around [[1372 DR]] Glinda disappeared and her position was taken by her "sister" [[Girella Scatterstar]] (in truth a [[doppelganger]]).
